title: Simple NDA
description: Non-Disclosure Agreement between Gamma Inc and Delta LLC. Covers confidentiality obligations, 24-month term, key dates.

title: Master Services Agreement
description: IT maintenance services contract between Alpha Corp and Beta Services Ltd. $150K value, Net 90 payment, 60-day termination notice.

title: Procurement Framework Agreement
description: Multi-category procurement framework between Pinnacle Manufacturing (UK) and GlobalSource (Singapore). GBP 85M value, volume discounts, liquidated damages, ESG requirements, performance bonds.

title: IT Outsourcing Services Agreement
description: 5-year IT outsourcing between Meridian Global Holdings (US) and TechServe Solutions (India). $47.5M value, 350 FTEs, 12 locations, SLA framework with 5 severity levels, GDPR compliance.
